sweat.translate: пот, тяжелый труд, потение, испарина, потеть, вспотеть, запотевать, волноваться
mnemonic: sweat [с(ув)е'т] пот - От солнечного (сувет-а) мы потеем.

sweat [swet]
***
ПОТЕЕТ он, когда рассвет. (это) sweat
Потение, волнение, тревога.
examples: Heat makes you sweat.
Sweat dropped from his brow.
He reeked of sweat.
He sweats a lot when he exercises.
I was bathed in a cold sweat
His forehead was dripping sweat.
The press sweat with controversy.
Don't sweat it, I'll lend you the money.
We all screw up from time to time, so don't sweat it.
His shirt was soaked with sweat.
I sweated blood to get that report finished.
His face was wet with sweat.
I was tired and bathed in sweat.
Beads of sweat appeared on his forehead.
My whole body broke out in a sweat.

As I grew more afraid, I broke into a cold sweat.
Well, the other team won the prize, but we made them sweat for it!

Exercise makes one sweat.
His hands were damped with sweat.

the rank odour of sweat and urine
